snippet: A professional baseball catcher, such as Russell Martin for the Yankees, is at once trusted and vital, exposed and embattled, relied on by his team and most likely underappreciated by fans.
abstract: Professional baseball catchers, such as Russell Martin for the New York Yankees, are at once trusted and vital, exposed and embattled, relied on by their teams and most likely underappreciated by fans.
lead_paragraph: A professional baseball catcher, such as Russell Martin for the Yankees, is at once trusted and vital, exposed and embattled, relied on by his team and most likely underappreciated by fans.

headline.seo: Russell Martin Plays Catcher, the Toughest Position in Baseball
headline.main: One Hard Way to Play Ball
headline.print_headline: One Hard Way To Play Ball
